title: Run a 'Just Listed' Social Media Ad Campaign
description: An agent wants to run a paid ad campaign on Facebook and Instagram for a new luxury listing.

tasks.description: Define the target audience for the ad based on demographics, interests (e.g., luxury goods), and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific target audience profile is created for the ad campaign.

tasks.description: Create compelling ad copy and select the best photos or a video for the ad creative.
tasks.expected_outcome: All components for the ad are prepared.

tasks.description: Launch the ad campaign with a set budget and duration, and monitor its performance (reach, clicks, leads).
tasks.expected_outcome: The ad campaign is live and its analytics are being tracked.
